metadata.title: CVE-2018-7725 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in ZZIPlib 0.13.68. An invalid memory addressdereference was discovered in zzip_disk_fread in mmapped.c. Thevulnerability causes an application crash, which leads to denial ofservice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7725` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zziplib package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1').
